title: Chapter 10: Accelerating Robotics with Isaac ROS
description: NVIDIA Isaac ROS is a collection of hardware-accelerated packages for ROS 2, specifically designed to leverage the power of NVIDIA GPUs and Jetson platforms. It provides high-performance, AI-accelerated capabilities for common robotics tasks, enabling developers to build and deploy complex perception and navigation pipelines more efficiently.

previous.title: Chapter 9: NVIDIA Isaac Sim for Advanced Simulation
